data

Class GA

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.GA

  • public class GA
extends java.lang.Object
    The Genetic algorithm for solving the Travelling salesman problem. Selects chromosomes, evolves and mutates them to find the best possible solution depending on the selection technique chosen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GA()

      Takes an array of cities to be visited and generates a solution to the travelling salesman problem.

    • Method Detail

      • calculatePath

        public Path calculatePath(java.util.ArrayList<City> cities,
                          double mutation,
                          int populationEvolution,
                          boolean elitsim,
                          SelectionType selectionType,
                          CrossoverType crossoverType)
        Takes an array of cities to be visited and generates a solution to the travelling salesman problem. Takes additional parameters to change how the GA works, and also produces graphs and statistics.
        Parameters:
        cities - List of cities
        mutation - Rate at which to mutate solutions
        populationEvolution - Number of evolutions
        elitsim - Elitism toggle
        selectionType - Type of selection
        crossoverType - Type of crossover
        Returns:
        SolutionPath
